metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Never Is A Promise is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Never Is A Promise has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Major,  and C Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
